---
title: "R Function"
---
Syntax of a function in R :

function_name(arg1, arg2, arg3, ...){
    statements
    return
}

Function With no parameters
```{r}
subtraction <- function() {
    n1 <- 30
    n2 <- 20
    result <- n1 - n2
    print(result)
}
subtraction()
```


```{r}
addition <- function(n1, n2) {
    result <- n1 + n2
    print(result)
    return(result)
}
# Calling the function
addition(10, 20)
```
